Class XRPMotor

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.xrp.XRPMotor
All Implemented Interfaces:
MotorController
public class XRPMotor extends Object implements MotorController
XRPMotor.

A SimDevice based motor controller representing the motors on an XRP robot
